title: Senior Full Stack Developer
description: We are looking for a Senior Full Stack Developer to join our engineering team. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining our core platform, working with modern technologies like React, Node.js, and cloud services.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in full-stack development
Proficiency in React, Node.js, and databases

title: Product Manager
description: Join our product team to drive the strategy and development of our service marketplace platform. You'll work closely with engineering, design, and business teams to deliver exceptional user experiences.
responsibilities: Collaborate with engineering and design teams

title: UX/UI Designer
description: We're seeking a talented UX/UI Designer to create intuitive and engaging user experiences for our service platform. You'll work on designing user flows, interfaces, and interactive prototypes.
requirements: Proficiency in Figma and design tools
responsibilities: Create user interface designs and prototypes
Conduct user research and usability testing
Collaborate with product and engineering teams

title: Data Scientist
description: Join our data team to build machine learning models and analytics solutions that power our recommendation systems and business intelligence.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: We're looking for a DevOps Engineer to manage our cloud infrastructure and deployment pipelines. You'll work on scaling our platform and ensuring high availability.
responsibilities: Set up and maintain CI/CD pipelines

title: Digital Marketing Manager
description: Lead our digital marketing efforts to drive user acquisition and brand awareness. You'll manage campaigns across multiple channels and optimize for growth.
requirements: Experience with Google Ads and Facebook Ads
Knowledge of SEO and content marketing
responsibilities: Develop and execute digital marketing strategies
Collaborate with content and design teams

title: Customer Success Manager
description: Help our customers achieve success with our platform. You'll work directly with service providers and customers to ensure satisfaction and drive retention.
requirements: 2+ years in customer success or account management
responsibilities: Analyze customer health and usage metrics

title: Mobile App Developer (React Native)
description: Join our mobile team to build and enhance our React Native applications for iOS and Android platforms.
responsibilities: Develop mobile applications using React Native
Optimize app performance and user experience
Collaborate with design and backend teams
Handle app store submissions and updates

title: Business Analyst
description: Analyze business processes and market trends to drive strategic decisions. You'll work with various teams to identify opportunities and improvements.
responsibilities: Conduct market research and competitive analysis
Create reports and presentations for leadership

title: Quality Assurance Engineer
description: Ensure the quality of our software products through comprehensive testing strategies. You'll work on both manual and automated testing.
requirements: Attention to detail and analytical thinking
responsibilities: Design and execute test plans and cases
Track and report bugs and issues

title: HR Business Partner
description: Partner with business leaders to drive HR strategies and initiatives. You'll focus on talent management, employee engagement, and organizational development.
requirements: Experience as an HR Business Partner
responsibilities: Partner with business leaders on HR strategy
Manage employee relations and performance issues
Drive talent acquisition and retention strategies

title: Content Marketing Specialist
description: Create compelling content that drives engagement and supports our marketing goals. You'll work on blog posts, social media, and marketing materials.

title: Financial Analyst
description: Support financial planning and analysis for the company. You'll work on budgeting, forecasting, and financial reporting.
requirements: Strong skills in Excel and financial modeling

title: Sales Development Representative
description: Generate qualified leads and support our sales team. You'll be responsible for prospecting, qualifying leads, and setting appointments.
requirements: 1+ years of sales or lead generation experience
responsibilities: Collaborate with marketing team on campaigns

title: Backend Developer (Python)
description: Develop and maintain our backend services and APIs. You'll work with Python, Django, and various databases to build scalable solutions.
requirements: Experience with Django or Flask frameworks
Knowledge of database design and optimization
responsibilities: Participate in code reviews and architecture discussions

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Protect our systems and data from security threats. You'll monitor security events, investigate incidents, and implement security measures.
requirements: Knowledge of security frameworks and standards
responsibilities: Investigate and respond to security incidents

title: Operations Manager
description: Lead our operations team to ensure efficient service delivery. You'll focus on process optimization, team management, and operational excellence.
requirements: Strong leadership and team management skills

title: Frontend Developer (Vue.js)
description: Build responsive and interactive user interfaces using Vue.js. You'll work closely with our design team to implement modern web applications.
responsibilities: Collaborate with backend developers on API integration
Participate in design reviews and technical discussions

title: Legal Counsel
description: Provide legal support and guidance for business operations. You'll handle contracts, compliance, and regulatory matters.
requirements: Experience in corporate and contract law
Knowledge of technology and startup legal issues
responsibilities: Draft and review legal documents and contracts
Provide legal advice on business matters

title: Business Development Executive
description: Drive business growth through strategic partnerships and new business opportunities. You'll identify and develop key relationships.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Build and deploy machine learning models to improve our platform's intelligence. You'll work on recommendation systems, demand forecasting, and optimization algorithms.
requirements: Experience with ML frameworks and libraries
Knowledge of MLOps and model deployment
responsibilities: Optimize algorithms for scale and performance

title: Graphic Designer
description: Create visual content for marketing campaigns, social media, and brand materials. You'll work on both digital and print designs.
requirements: Experience with both digital and print media
responsibilities: Design social media graphics and campaigns
Develop brand guidelines and visual identity
Collaborate with marketing and content teams

title: Cloud Solutions Architect
description: Design and implement scalable cloud infrastructure solutions. You'll lead architecture decisions and optimize our cloud platform for performance and cost.
requirements: Strong understanding of system design principles

title: SEO Specialist
description: Improve our website's search engine visibility and drive organic traffic. You'll work on technical SEO, content optimization, and link building strategies.
requirements: Knowledge of Google Analytics and Search Console
Experience with SEO tools (SEMrush, Ahrefs, etc.)
responsibilities: Optimize website content for search engines
Monitor and report on SEO performance
Develop and execute link building strategies

title: Database Administrator
description: Manage and optimize our database systems for performance, security, and reliability. You'll handle backup strategies, performance tuning, and database maintenance.
requirements: Expertise in PostgreSQL, MySQL, or MongoDB
Experience with backup and recovery procedures
Understanding of database security best practices

title: Technical Writer
description: Create clear and comprehensive technical documentation for our products and services. You'll work with engineering teams to document APIs, user guides, and internal processes.
requirements: Proficiency in documentation tools (Confluence, GitBook, etc.)
responsibilities: Collaborate with engineering and product teams

title: Social Media Manager
description: Manage our social media presence across multiple platforms. You'll create engaging content, build community, and drive brand awareness through social channels.
requirements: 3+ years of social media marketing experience
Experience with major social media platforms
Strong content creation and copywriting skills
Knowledge of social media analytics tools
Understanding of community management best practices
responsibilities: Develop social media strategies and campaigns
Collaborate with marketing and design teams

title: Network Engineer
description: Design, implement, and maintain our network infrastructure. You'll ensure network security, performance, and reliability across all our locations.
requirements: Knowledge of routing and switching protocols

title: Project Manager
description: Lead cross-functional teams to deliver projects on time and within budget. You'll manage project lifecycle, coordinate stakeholders, and ensure successful project outcomes.
responsibilities: Manage project timelines, budgets, and resources
Report on project status and metrics

title: UX Researcher
description: Conduct user research to inform product decisions and improve user experiences. You'll design studies, analyze user behavior, and present insights to product teams.
requirements: Experience with qualitative and quantitative research methods
Knowledge of user testing and analytics tools
responsibilities: Design and conduct user research studies
Analyze user behavior and feedback data
Collaborate with design and product teams
Maintain user research repository and insights

title: Supply Chain Analyst
description: Optimize our supply chain operations and logistics. You'll analyze supply chain data, identify improvement opportunities, and support operational efficiency initiatives.
requirements: 2+ years of supply chain or operations experience
Strong analytical and data analysis skills
Proficiency in Excel and data visualization tools
Knowledge of supply chain management principles
responsibilities: Analyze supply chain performance and metrics
Create reports and dashboards for operations team
Collaborate with logistics and operations teams

title: Email Marketing Specialist
description: Develop and execute email marketing campaigns to drive customer engagement and retention. You'll manage email automation, segmentation, and performance optimization.
requirements: Experience with email marketing platforms (Mailchimp, HubSpot, etc.)
Knowledge of email automation and segmentation
Understanding of email deliverability best practices
Experience with A/B testing and optimization
responsibilities: Design and execute email marketing campaigns
Segment email lists for targeted campaigns

title: Compliance Officer
description: Ensure our business operations comply with applicable laws and regulations. You'll develop compliance programs, conduct risk assessments, and manage regulatory relationships.
requirements: 4+ years of compliance or regulatory experience
Strong understanding of risk management principles

title: Mobile QA Engineer
description: Ensure the quality of our mobile applications through comprehensive testing on iOS and Android platforms. You'll develop test strategies and automation frameworks.
requirements: Experience with iOS and Android testing
Knowledge of mobile automation tools (Appium, XCTest, Espresso)
Understanding of mobile app development lifecycle
Experience with performance and security testing
responsibilities: Design and execute mobile testing strategies
Develop automated test suites for mobile apps
Ensure app store compliance and quality standards

title: Partnerships Manager
description: Build strategic partnerships to expand our market reach and drive business growth. You'll identify, negotiate, and manage key partnership relationships.
requirements: 4+ years of partnership or business development experience
Strong negotiation and relationship management skills
Understanding of marketplace and platform business models
responsibilities: Identify and evaluate potential partnership opportunities

title: Information Security Analyst
description: Protect our information assets and ensure security compliance. You'll conduct security assessments, implement security controls, and respond to security incidents.

title: Training and Development Specialist
description: Design and deliver training programs to enhance employee skills and performance. You'll develop learning strategies, create training content, and measure training effectiveness.
requirements: 3+ years of training and development experience
Experience with learning design and instructional design

title: E-commerce Manager
description: Manage our e-commerce operations and marketplace presence. You'll optimize product listings, manage inventory, and drive online sales growth.
requirements: Experience with marketplace platforms (Amazon, Flipkart, etc.)
Knowledge of e-commerce analytics and optimization
Understanding of digital marketing and SEO
Experience with inventory and supply chain management
responsibilities: Monitor inventory levels and supply chain

title: Video Content Creator
description: Create engaging video content for marketing campaigns and social media. You'll handle video production from concept to final delivery.
requirements: Proficiency in video editing software (Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro)
Experience with camera operation and lighting
Understanding of social media video formats
responsibilities: Develop video content concepts and scripts
Collaborate with marketing and design teams
Manage video production equipment and resources

title: Customer Support Team Lead
description: Lead our customer support team to deliver exceptional customer experiences. You'll manage team performance, develop processes, and drive customer satisfaction.
requirements: Experience with customer support tools and CRM systems
Knowledge of customer service best practices
responsibilities: Lead and manage customer support team
Develop customer support processes and procedures
Monitor team performance and customer satisfaction
Provide training and coaching to team members
Escalate and resolve complex customer issues

title: Account Manager
description: Manage key client relationships and drive account growth. You'll work with enterprise clients to ensure satisfaction and expansion.
responsibilities: Collaborate with internal teams on delivery

title: Performance Marketing Specialist
description: Drive customer acquisition through performance marketing campaigns. You'll optimize ad spend and improve conversion rates.
requirements: Experience with Google Ads and Facebook Ads
responsibilities: Test and iterate on ad creatives
Report on marketing metrics and KPIs

title: IT Support Specialist
description: Provide technical support to employees and maintain IT equipment. You'll handle hardware, software, and network support issues.
requirements: Knowledge of hardware and software troubleshooting
Experience with Windows and Mac systems

title: Risk Analyst
description: Assess and manage various business risks. You'll develop risk models and implement risk mitigation strategies.
responsibilities: Report on risk status to management

title: UX Researcher
description: Conduct user research to inform product decisions. You'll design studies, gather insights, and present findings to product teams.
requirements: Knowledge of user testing and analytics
responsibilities: Design and conduct user research studies
Collaborate with design and product teams

title: Sales Manager
description: Lead our sales team to achieve revenue targets. You'll develop sales strategies, manage team performance, and drive business growth.
requirements: Proven track record of meeting sales targets
Strong leadership and team management skills
responsibilities: Collaborate with marketing and product teams

title: Brand Manager
description: Manage and grow our brand presence. You'll develop brand strategies, oversee campaigns, and ensure consistent brand messaging.
responsibilities: Collaborate with creative and marketing teams

title: API Developer
description: Design and develop APIs that power our platform. You'll work on REST and GraphQL APIs, ensuring scalability and performance.
requirements: Knowledge of API design best practices
Experience with API testing and documentation
responsibilities: Collaborate with frontend and mobile teams

title: Talent Acquisition Specialist
description: Lead our talent acquisition efforts to build amazing teams. You'll source, screen, and hire top talent across all departments.
requirements: Experience with technical and non-technical hiring
Experience with ATS and recruiting tools
responsibilities: Build talent pipelines for key roles

title: Growth Product Manager
description: Drive user growth through product experimentation and optimization. You'll focus on acquisition, activation, retention, and monetization.
requirements: Knowledge of A/B testing and optimization
responsibilities: Analyze user behavior and conversion funnels
Collaborate with engineering and design teams
